Explain fully the circumstances of a: The payment was made pursuant to an agreement whereby Mr. Cannon met individually and in groups with employees in the potential bargaining unit to communicate accurate and legal information in a legal manner about the company's position regarding working with and negotiating with the union local that was trying to organize them.
